Articles.Content:
is the rover coming any time soon?

Nope. I'm busy with school now and the mesh is messed up. And I want to finish my lander and aeroshells first.

You misunderstand I am unable to attach anything horizontally.I am only able to attack modules to the upper and lower surface of the 6 sided hub. I cannot attach anything to the 4 horizontal surfaces.

I'm not sure then. They worked last I checked.

Nope. I'm busy with school now and the mesh is messed up. And I want to finish my lander and aeroshells first.

I'm not sure then. They worked last I checked.

Uninstalled and reinstalled. Works now....that was weird
Hmm..I can board the surface-attached airlock, but cannot leave it anymore. It keeps telling me the hatch is obstructed. Am I doing it wrong?

Hmm..I can board the surface-attached airlock, but cannot leave it anymore. It keeps telling me the hatch is obstructed. Am I doing it wrong?

Click the EVA button repeatedly.

Nope. I'm busy with school now and the mesh is messed up. And I want to finish my lander and aeroshells first.

I'm not sure then. They worked last I checked.

rover gone from first post... pls dont say its get abondoned that was really cute
yea it look like a pathfinder...WAIT A MIN pathfinder had airbags:confused:

yea it look like a pathfinder...WAIT A MIN pathfinder had airbags:confused:

airbags from Lionhead Aerospace Inc. can be used... but its on progress atm can be found at earlier ver.

Update is available in the OP: Now featuring Aeroshells.

Edited:

Forgot to add the ejectable heatshield and backshell for the atmospheric probe. Now at 0.1.1

Edited September 16, 2012 by Pelf
I can't attach the large aeroshell parachute at all, am I doing something wrong?

No, it's weird like that. Try flipping it upside-down, attaching it, then removing it and attaching it right-side-up.

I'll play around with the collision meshes and see if I can't fix it.
I'll try this on Duna with my Prometheus Rovers from Lionhead AFTER I do some tests.
The docking port and CBM don't work right now right?
Hmm... Need to rummage around through some new parts, but I think there might be a way to make them quasi-functional... BBL.
OK, my research shows that Hogdriver's ORDA could be made compatible with the CBM parts, or any other "eye candy" docking port. Next up: testing this theory in the game.
Any progress on the Sojourner-type rover?
Pretty much abandoned for now. The mesh got ruined somehow and I haven't had the motivation to fix it. I might get around to it but don't count on it.
Aww, I really liked it. I want something other than a little ball to stick in my aeroshells!
agreed we don't want a little ball in a airshells im thinking of a solar panel pod then a cart or rover body with camera too!
with some messing about the lionhead rover + skycrane fits in the large aero shell. I already have a curiosity style mission planned.

Inside the EXPI folder are two airlock folders.

Wat do.
I have a problem with the probe parts. Namely the Mach Chute didn't actually open during my first test on Kerbin. Am I forgetting something?

>Tomthetechy

There are 4. 2 different sizes and a pod and normal part version of each so that you can have as much crew space as you want on your ship. Just copy them all.

A working Docking System in the Stations Pack Would be nice!

Anyways: Good Work!
What are the airlocks even for?

What are the airlocks even for?

Fun, i guess XD
